column2: Falcon Minerals Corp. engages in the provision of oil and gas minerals. The company is headquartered in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania and currently employs 8 full-time employees. The firm owns mineral rights positions in the core-of-the-core of the Eagle Ford Shale. The firm owns mineral, royalty, and over-riding royalty interests covering over 251,000 gross unit acres in the Eagle Ford and Austin Chalk in Karnes County, DeWitt County, and Gonzales County Texas. The firm has over 3,000 drilling locations.
